title: Recruiting For A New Rank 5's Team (InVictous)
body:
Hello
I am looking for players who are around the silver/low gold area to recruit for a rank 5's team.

Requirements:
- Skype (Means you actually have to talk!)
- Working Mic/Headphones
- Age 14+ (For Maturity)
- Able to play at least 3-4 nights a week 
- Must be willing to learn/grow as a player so we can get better
- Must not crack under pressure in games (Don't rage and be like OMG THERES NO WAY WE CAN WIN THIS)

Feel free to msg myself either on here or add me on league :D
My ign is: UnseenBlade

Thanks.   
{{summoner:31}}
